title: How to get a  VICTORIOUS Skin without playing ranked
body:
[](https://img.rankedboost.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/Gold-Tier.png)

Buy the champion who is victorious by default:

replies.body: I'm sorry if I'm ruining a joke, but is there something I'm not getting?
I have a lot of {{champion:112}} skins.

> {{champion:6}} Say Shurima *one more time!*

Even the magnificent winrate of Azir approves!
I recently got galactic azir from a chest. Feels good

khazix
i don t know how i get skin but i want skin for kha zix
